Text: Yo Silk!  Had a great weekend up in Seattle and then come back and find that The Bay is back online..=)
Thank you! We missed you, + hope you had a good time.

Well thanks bonzodog..=)  It's great to be back!

Enjoy!

I say crappy picture only ads to the old-timey creature feature ambience.

Who would dare to watch The Things From Outer Space in clear picture? Your eyes would melt in HD!

Also, fuzzy pixels obscure the zipper on the Creature from the Black Lagoon.
